title: 5: That Vessel Business: Dark Desires After Dusk
dc:creator: Sarah MacLean
description: DEMONS ARE HERE! We’re talking Dark Desires After Dusk, starring Cadeon Woede  (Prince of the Rage Demonarchy) and Holly, his human fated mate (SPOILER SHE ISN’T HUMAN, WHAT!). This one is the first in what we will end up calling the Demonarchy Duology — and we encourage you to read the next book in the series, Kiss of A Demon King as soon as you can after reading Dark Desires. Each book makes the other better. We’ll cover female rage, sex shaming, fast cars, food, feminism and…maybe a pot joke? Also, Sarah waxes on about horns. A lot.
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Jen and Sarah discuss Dark Desires After Dark.
